venue.name: Demo Bistro
venue.description: Try our QR ordering system with this interactive demo

items.name: Classic Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil
items.descriptionAlbanian: Bukë e pjekur me domate të freskët, borzilok dhe vaj ulliri

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Fresh cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese
items.descriptionAlbanian: Kastravec të freskët, domate, ullinj dhe djathë feta

items.name: Grilled Sea Bass
items.description: Fresh sea bass grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon
items.descriptionAlbanian: Levrek i freskët në skarë me erëza dhe limon

items.name: Seafood Risotto
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed seafood and saffron
items.descriptionAlbanian: Risotto kremoz me fruta deti të përziera dhe shafran

items.name: Albanian Beer
items.description: Local craft beer brewed in Albania
items.descriptionAlbanian: Birrë artizanale lokale e prodhuar në Shqipëri

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.descriptionAlbanian: Limon të shtrydhur të freskët me mente

items.name: House Wine (Glass)
items.description: Local Albanian wine, red or white
items.descriptionAlbanian: Verë lokale shqiptare, e kuqe ose e bardhë

items.name: Traditional Baklava
items.description: Layers of phyllo pastry with nuts and honey
items.descriptionAlbanian: Shtresa brumi fillo me arra dhe mjaltë

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee and mascarpone
items.descriptionAlbanian: Ëmbëlsirë klasike italiane me kafe dhe mascarpone
